page.title: 13EXWICK EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Exwick is quite a big village with many families and there is a variety of emploment there. The largest employers are the Bakery with{320 employees and the Guide Dogs Training Centre with{65}workers. There are several small businesses,many of them owned and run by families. The people of Exwick can buy their food at one of the 4 food shops which give employment to{23}people,and see to their motoring needs at the Garage and motor shop where{11}people work altogether. There is a garden centre,hairdresser, newsagent and wool shop which employ {25}people in total.{47}people work in connection with the education of Exwick children at the play group and 2 schools. For their refreshment the people of Exwick have 2 pubs where a total of{20}people work.Altogether{499 people work in the places mentioned.
